content: You are an expert in program verification, helping generate training data for AI models.

You are assisting in generating a large-scale dataset of verified Dafny programs for training Large Language Models. Here is a list of existing ideas we already had: 
$IDEAS
Now, you will create novel, creative ideas for other programs. Generate $N high-level ideas for new verified programs, including a brief description of what the program could accomplish and what might be verified about it. Aim for short, 1-3 sentence descriptions, and try to maximize diversity, and avoid ideas that are close to those above. Output $N lines, each one containing one idea, in the format "<index>. <idea>", where <index> starts after the list above and <idea> is your description.
